item.title: Trump Mistakes Weakness for Strength
item.description: The president’s repeated claims of victimization only make him smaller.

item.title: The Supreme Court Should Not Encourage a One-Judge Constitutional Crisis
item.description: Amir Ali shouldn’t be allowed to direct U.S. foreign policy.

item.title: A French Coup for the Art Institute of Chicago
item.description: The Horvitz collection of Old Master French drawings and paintings, the best in America, heads to Chicago as a gift.

item.title: Will Republicans Cut Corporate Welfare?
item.description: The GOP should curb business subsidies, corporate-tax loopholes, and the protection of favored industries.

item.title: The Dream Palace of Gaza
item.description: A delusional Arab proposal for Gaza makes Trump’s plan for rebuilding the Strip from the ground up look pragmatic by comparison.
